title: Listy
text:
Listy is a Chrome notifier for Twitter List

Listy can be used to watch the twitter lists in real time when they got new tweets it will notify through chrome notification.

Here you can manage multiple twitter accounts and get notified accordingly and manage their notifications So it is a great tool to monitor twitter lists

To get Started
  • Install the Lisy Extension
  • Go to options page and add a twitter account
  • Select list option
  • In List page you can select what account and list to notify/not notify.
